            Bio
            In summer 2022, I completed the Data
            Analytics and Computational Social Science (DACSS) Masters
            program at the University of
            Massachusetts, Amherst. My present position is Senior
            Systems and Analytics Engineer at the Gandara Center in
            West Springfield, MA.
            This site contains my academic blog with ruminations on computational
            social science, my own learning processes and discoveries,
            and related technical topics and snippets.
            
            
            Education
            MS, Data Analytics and Computational Social
            Science | 2022
            University of Massachusetts, Amherst | Amherst, MA
            BA, Social Science | 1992
            Hampshire College | Amherst, MA
            
            
            Experience
            Gandara Center, West Springfield, MA |
            Senior Systems and Analytics Engineer / CIO / IT Director |
            2005 - Present
            Silicon Goblin Technologies, Amherst, MA
            | Owner / Programmer | 1999 - 2015
            Rojo Networks, San Francisco, CA |
            Systems Administrator and Customer Service Lead |
            2006-2008
            National Center on Adult Literacy,
            University of Pennsylvania Graduate School of Education,
            Philadelphia, PA | Systems Programmer and Lead Web Developer
            | 1997-1999
            Holyoke Public Schools, Holyoke, MA |
            Literacy and GED Instructor | 1994-1997
            Unicom, Inc., Providence, RI | Systems
            Programmer and Technical Writer | 1983-1997
            
            
            Interests
            Data analytics, statistics, machine learning
            Software engineering
            Politics, culture and the state of the world
            Drawing, painting, guitar, motorcycles, baking,
            gaming
